attributes.action: Allow people who the NHS can not help, to control chronic pain. To be able to use/ grow there own cannabis for personal/ self medication without fear of prosicution. Only if backed up by pain specialist, if all else on the NHS fails!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned believe that it’s our own humane right that if the NHS cannot help us with chronic pain / disability’s, through rehab and medication and cannabis is proven to contol / help us with our pain, Only if backed up by pain specialist. Then we would like to be able to use or even grow our own medication without the fear of been arrested.

This can be done under strict government control, with regular police inspections of grow areas if requested at any time.

The DNA of plants can even be taken, under licence. So if any cannabis is sold it will be traceable.

All we are asking is for your support or just your consideration on this matter Mr Brown.

Thank you for you time in looking at our request

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
